title: Immediate Disadvantage
description:
Jiyoon, who had a boring daily life without anything special, meets Hyunsoo, a man who claims to be his mother's boyfriend. Jiyoon has always had the same taste as her mother. Seeing Hyunsoo cry in front of me makes me feel like I want to bully him more...
 "What about me? I can be really nice to you"
author: 수락
